Name: Drift Mania
About the game: You are driving an unusual car, which resembles a mixture of a scooter and a jet hoverboard that is ready to tear and throw, perfectly fitting into the turns and dodging audience sympathy in the form of flying barrels, which strive to spoil your victory. Drift Mania is a 3d race focused on performing drift stunts and passing the track, competing with three other drivers in terms of the number of points accumulated. During all the races, your spectators will now and then throw barrels on the roads, which slow you down and knock you down from performing stunts. Game features: - Nice visual style - Dynamic music - Complexity - For the whole family
